#Text=THE LOST FISH
#Text=" You come with me , Freddie , " said Mr. Button .
#Text=Fred 's face flushed at the term applied to him by his grandfather and still deeper color appeared in his cheeks when he saw a mischievous expression appear in the eyes of the girls .

#Text=To be called by the name be which he was called when he was a little fellow , or at least very much smaller than he was at the present time , was the last thing that could be applied him in the way of teasing .
#Text=Mr. Button , however , had no thought of annoying his grandson and used the term simply because it had been familiar to him from the time when Fred was born .

#Text=" Good-by , Freddie , good-by , " called the three Go Ahead boys together , as their comrade obediently followed the call and at once joined his grandfather and the man who had demanded the bond and turned into the street .
#Text=" That fellow was waiting for us , " exclaimed George in surprise .
#Text=" I believe that Mr. Button knew all the time that he was to be here .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= Well , what do you make of it ?

#Text= I do n't know what to make of it .

_	_	_	_

#Text=And the worst of it is that we have it ,  said George ruefully .

#Text= That 's what we do n't know , but that does n't mean that everything we see , which may be the property of somebody we do n't know , belongs to us .

#Text= Well , if this Mr. Somebody owns that bond why does n't he come and claim it ?

#Text= I suppose we might as well give in first as last , " said George in mock despair .

column1: #Text=" If anybody knows where we can get any ice cream we 'll start .

#Text= We 'll start anyway , " spoke up Miss Susie .

column1: #Text=" If we start we shall find it .

#Text= Sam , " said Fred , " what do you think our chances are against that Varmint II ?

66-4	3743-3744	.	_	_	_	_

#Text= That motor-boat that we were racing .

_	_	_	_

#Text= I think it will depend somewhat on how fast we go , " said Sam .

column1: #Text=" What a wise man you are , " laughed Fred .
#Text=" I might have thought of that myself if I had tried hard .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= I think we can if we go faster than she does , " replied Sam .

column1: #Text=" Well , can we make her go faster ?

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= You can if the speed is in her .

_	_	_	_

#Text= Well , do you think the speed is in her ?

_	_	_	_

#Text= I ca n't say just yet , " said Sam , who was not to be moved from his cautious position .

column1: #Text=" Here come your friends , " he added as the boys and girls were seen approaching the dock .

#Text=Mr. Button grumbled over the delay which had been caused by the failure of the young people to return , but as no one except Fred understood just what he was saying slight attention was paid him .
#Text=Meanwhile at Sam 's command the engine was started , and the Black Growler , free from the dock once more , soon was noisily and speedily making her way down the mighty river .
#Text=" Why did n't you beat that other boat ?

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= Well , what were you trying to do ?
